## Example maptools

Three lines of code to plot a worldmap:

```{r, fig.height=3.5}
library(maptools)
data(wrld_simpl)
plot(wrld_simpl)
```


## A map for Europe

```{r}
Europe <- wrld_simpl[wrld_simpl$REGION=="150",]
plot(Europe,col="royalblue")
```


## Fewer states

```{r}
threeStates <- wrld_simpl[wrld_simpl$NAME%in%c("Germany","Poland","Denmark"),]
plot(threeStates,col="chocolate1")
```
